Pre-Game Insights: England captain Jos Buttler criticized the uneven grass coverage and a loose sandy make-up at the HPCA Stadium in Dharamshala, suggesting 'the integrity of the game' could be compromised.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan spinner Mujeeb Ur Rahman came close to a nasty injury on Saturday when his knee lodged in the surface as he slid to stop a boundary.
Others: England are likely to draft left-arm quick Reece Topley into their starting XI, while Ben Stokes is unlikely to feature as he recovers from a hip injury.
Eoin Morgan believes Ben Stokes' presence carries even more weight than it did previously, given his achievements as a T20 world champion and inspirational Test captain.
